title: Abba gold: greatest hits
brief_description: Abba’s enduring musical heritage has remained vibrant despite the band’s breakup in the 1980’s. Their success has been revitalised by copy bands, motion picture soundtracks and cover versions of their songs. This compilation tape presents video-clips of Abba’s most popular hits capturing the music, fashion and dance steps universally associated with the band. The songs featured on this tape are: 1. Dancing queen 2. Knowing me, knowing you 3. Take a chance on me 4. Mamma mia 5. Lay all your love on me 6. Super trouper 7. The Winner takes it all 8. Money, money, money 9. S.O.S. 10. Chiquitita 11. Fernando 12. Voulez vous 13. Gimme! Gimme! Gimme! (a man after midnight) 14. Does your mother know 15. One of us 16. I have a dream 17. The Name of the game 18. Thank you for the music 19. Waterloo.
